examples.example: 虽然我是个普通人，但我也有着不普通的梦想，并努力去实现它。

translate.english: Although I am an ordinary person, I also have an extraordinary dream and strive to realize it.

examples.example: 这位看似普通的老师，却用自己独特的教学方法激发了学生们无限的潜力。

translate.english: This seemingly ordinary teacher has inspired the unlimited potential of the students with his unique teaching method.

examples.example: 生活中那些普通的小事，往往蕴含着最真实的美好。

translate.english: Those ordinary small things in life often contain the truest beauty.
